text: Can you say more about this? Do you mean how to format mobile phone number property values?

I want to validate number with a length of 7 or 10, only numbers in chatbots.
My workaround: Added a if/then that contains "a", "b", "c", "etc", "." ... But I can't set the length of the numbers.
If you have Operations Hub, using Custom Code or the Format Data action should allow you to do this

Is there any way to enroll contacts in a workflow based on properties of a custom object? Was expecting with a one-to-one cardinality this would be a no brainer - like the associated Deal capability and associated company
that should be the case as all new workflows will display associated properties as long as there is any type of association defined between the two objects
what type of workflow is it?
I will take an eye on that. Thanks
Of course. Specifically the Format Data action has some advanced functionality launching soon that will address phone number formatting. More on that in the coming weeks.
I see custom object to contact but not contacts with associated custom object
Right, there is an ongoing project to bring that functionality to Contact workflows. It's the primary goal of one of our teams but I don't have a timeline yet unfortunately
thx Zeke! can my account be put on the Beta list?
let me talk to the team and let them know you're interested for when we open up the beta. It's still not working properly so it wouldn't do what you're looking for
That's great. Thanks for taking the time.
